start.welcome: Hello! Welcome to our The sequencer game.
start.goal: Your goal is to get to 10 items in your sequence as quickly as you can without having more than 2 vowels in any of the sequence. The sequence gets generated by adding the letters and numbers between your current position and your next position.
start.rules: Your tool of choice is a chess knight - so your movements will be restricted the the ones a knight makes.

gameplay.prompt: Press a new letter to move to in the board:
gameplay.prompt_hints: (Psst! Write `responses` to see all paths, `reset` to reset the game or `exit` to exit)

finish.done: You're done, you reached 10 items in the sequence.
finish.success: Well done! you finished a sequence with no vowels
finish.vowel: You completed the game with only 1 vowel. Not bad.
finish.vowels: Well... at least you finished, despite adding as many vowels as you could.
finish.replay: Do you want to play again? If so, press y else press any other key

exit.smile: Seems someone didn't want to play...
